WRITING.TITLE: Moonlight can't hold a connection for more than a few minutes
WRITING.TEXT: I got moonlight for my vita to stream simple steam games to my vita and it works great but keeps disconnecting. I can reconnect just fine but it usually just disconnects again a minute later. Any ideas for why this is happening?
So I just started using this because it seemed pretty cool but when I am playing a game it keeps disconnecting, i am able to reconnect just fine but it's is quite annoying. Anyone know a fix?
This is my first time hearing about this, can this be used for non-steam games or only steam games?
Inb4 10 other people ask for free vitas
Instant Karma? Just post on me_irl
